r.s: Services_Atlassian_Crowd is a package to use Atlassian Crowd from PHP
r.d:
Crowd is a web-based single sign-on (SSO) tool that simplifies application provisioning and identity management.
This package is derived from the PHP Client Library for Atlassian Crowd class written by Infinite Campus, Inc.
r.n: - fixed installation path in package.xml - fixed bug: #14955
